DOC.brief_summary: This study intends to describe the real-life effectiveness and safety of nivolumab in advanced NSCLC patients in Germany, as well as the patient profile, pattern of use and the quality of life.
DOC.brief_title: Real-Life Study With Nivolumab (BMS-936558) in Advanced NSCLC Patients After Prior Chemotherapy
DOC.criteria: 1. Histologically or cytologically confirmed diagnosis of locally advanced or metastatic NSCLC, Stage IIIB/Stage IV 2. Decision to initiate a treatment with Nivolumab for the first time already undertaken by physician 3. Males and Females, â‰¥18 years of age 1. Current primary diagnosis of a cancer other than advanced NSCLC. Example: A cancer other than NSCLC that requires systemic or other treatment. 2. Pretreatment with Nivolumab and/or Ipilimumab (pretreatment with checkpointinhibitors other than Nivolumab and Ipilimumab, and Tyrosine Kinase Inhibitors(TKIs) is allowed) 3. Current participation in an interventional clinical trial for treatment of NSCLC. (Patients who have completed their participation in an interventional trial or who are not receiving study drug anymore and who are only followedup for overall survival can be enrolled. For blinded studies, the treatment administered needs to be known)
